title: Workshop on Utilizing Learning Analytics for Blended Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in science and experience in curriculum operation
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for science field managers/leaders in corporations to enhance proficiency in smartphone-based learning analytics tools

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three improvement points for blended learning processes by interpreting learning analytics data
Students can analyze online activity patterns (login frequency, content interaction, etc.) through visualized materials
Learners can establish action plans for course redesign based on analytical results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
